SELECT G.GOODS_SEQ, G.GOODS_NAME, G.PRICE, G.ECO_SCORE , GTN.IMG_URL , (SELECT NVL( ROUND( AVG( NVL(STAR,0) ), 1 ), 0) FROM GOODS_COMMENT WHERE GOODS_COMMENT.GOODS_SEQ = G.GOODS_SEQ) AS STAR FROM GOODS G LEFT OUTER JOIN GOODS_THUMB_NAIL GTN ON G.GOODS_SEQ = GTN.GOODS_SEQ AND GTN.MAIN_YN = 'Y' WHERE G.SALE_YN = 'Y'
AND G.CATEGORY = #{category}
AND G.GOODS_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY G.GOODS_SEQ OFFSET #{start} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{amount} ROWS ONLY

SELECT G.GOODS_SEQ, G.COMP_SEQ, G.GOODS_NAME, G.PRICE, G.QTY, G.MATERIAL, G.CATEGORY , G.REQ_OPTION , G.GOODS_DETAIL , (SELECT NVL( ROUND( AVG( NVL(STAR,0) ), 1 ), 0) FROM GOODS_COMMENT WHERE GOODS_COMMENT.GOODS_SEQ = G.GOODS_SEQ) AS STAR , COMP.COMP_NAME FROM GOODS G LEFT OUTER JOIN COMPANY COMP ON G.COMP_SEQ = COMP.COMP_SEQ WHERE G.SALE_YN = 'Y' AND G.GOODS_SEQ = #{goods_seq}
SELECT GOODS_SEQ, GOODS_THUMB_NAIL_SEQ , IMG_URL , MAIN_YN FROM GOODS_THUMB_NAIL WHERE GOODS_SEQ = #{goods_seq}
SELECT GOODS_SEQ, IMG_ORDER, IMG_URL, GOODS_DETAIL_IMG_KEY FROM GOODS_DETAIL_IMG WHERE GOODS_SEQ = #{goods_seq}
SELECT GOODS_SEQ, GOODS_REQ_OPTION_SEQ, PRICE, OPTION_NAME FROM GOODS_REQ_OPTION WHERE GOODS_SEQ = #{goods_seq}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GOODS_COMMENT WHERE GOODS_SEQ = #{goodsSeq}

SELECT GC.GOODS_COMMENT_SEQ, GC.GOODS_SEQ, GC.CUST_ID, GC.STAR, GC.MEMO, TO_CHAR(GC.REGDATE, 'YY/MM/DD hh:mi:ss') AS REGDATE , C.NAME , G.GOODS_NAME FROM GOODS_COMMENT GC INNER JOIN CUST C ON GC.CUST_ID = C.MEMBERID INNER JOIN GOODS G ON GC.GOODS_SEQ = G.GOODS_SEQ WHERE GC.GOODS_SEQ = #{goodsSeq} ORDER BY REGDATE DESC OFFSET #{start} rows FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOODS_THUMB_NAIL( GOODS_SEQ ,GOODS_THUMB_NAIL_SEQ ,IMG_URL ,MAIN_YN ,REGDATE ,REGUSER ,EDITDATE ,EDITUSER ) VALUES ( #{goods_seq} ,(SELECT NVL(MAX(GOODS_THUMB_NAIL_SEQ),0) + 1 FROM GOODS_THUMB_NAIL WHERE GOODS_SEQ = #{goods_seq}) ,#{img_url} ,(SELECT CASE WHEN NVL(MAX(GOODS_THUMB_NAIL_SEQ),0) = 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM GOODS_THUMB_NAIL WHERE GOODS_SEQ = #{goods_seq}) ,SYSDATE ,#{reguser} ,NULL ,NULL )
